spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room placement are highly accurate. Most doors are correctly placed. Minor issues: The entry door swing is inverted compared to the plan, and the window in the bottom-right kitchen area is rotated to the side wall instead of the bottom wall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural adherence. No text labels or UI elements present. Model is floating on a dark neutral background with all walls visible and roof removed.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is strong, capturing complex items like the L-shaped sofa and specific desk orientations. Minor deduction for the plant in the corner of the dining area being omitted.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect low-poly execution with flat colors and no textures. Lighting is soft and incidental. The camera is isometric, though slightly lower than a perfect 45-degree angle.

detected_errors.description: Entry door orientation/swing is inverted relative to the 2D floor plan layout.
Kitchen window moved from the bottom exterior wall to the right exterior wall.
Decorative plant elements shown in 2D plan are missing from the 3D render.
